alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:01PM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snowfall accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Snow will taper off in coverage and intensity Saturday afternoon before showers redevelop on Sunday. Additional moderate to heavy snow is possible from Sunday onwards. * WHERE...In Utah, La Sal and Abajo Mountains. In Colorado, Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops and mountain passes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
